perturbation.original_text: 1.6 HDI shall have the Site fully operational and accessible on demand by users of the Internet no later than sixty (60) days from the date this Agreement has been executed by both Parties. In the event that HDI fails to have the Site fully operational within seventy (70) days from the date of this Agreement, the Company shall have the right to terminate this Agreement without penalty.
perturbation.changed_text: 1.6 HDI shall have the Site fully operational and accessible on demand by users of the Internet no later than one hundred twenty (120) days from the date this Agreement has been executed by both Parties. In the event that HDI fails to have the Site fully operational within one hundred thirty (130) days from the date of this Agreement, the Company shall have the right to terminate this Agreement without penalty.
perturbation.explanation: The modification extends the deadline for HDI to make the site fully operational. If the operational location is in California, California law requires certain contracts to be completed within a reasonable time frame. Setting an unreasonably long initial deadline can create issues with contract enforceability under California law.
perturbation.contradicted_law: California Civil Code Section 1657 (Time of Performance of Contract)

perturbation.original_text: 3.2 Payments to HDI shall be due monthly within thirty (30) days of the end of each calendar month and shall be accompanied by documentation reasonably detailing the calculation of the payment.
perturbation.changed_text: 3.2 Payments to HDI shall be due quarterly within ninety (90) days of the end of each calendar quarter and shall be accompanied by documentation reasonably detailing the calculation of the payment.
perturbation.explanation: The payment term has been changed from monthly within 30 days to quarterly within 90 days. Delayed payment terms, especially for smaller businesses, can be seen as an unfair business practice under various state laws relating to prompt payment, potentially leading to legal challenges.

perturbation.original_text: 10.1 Notices. Any notice under this Agreement will be in writing and delivered by personal delivery, express courier, confirmed facsimile, or certified or registered mail, return receipt requested and will be deemed given upon personal delivery, one (1) day after deposit with express courier, upon confirmation of receipt of facsimile or five (5),days after deposit in the mail.
perturbation.changed_text: 10.1 Notices. Any notice under this Agreement will be in writing and delivered by personal delivery or standard mail and will be deemed given upon personal delivery, or thirty (30) days after deposit in the mail.
perturbation.explanation: The modification eliminates express courier, confirmed facsimile, certified or registered mail with return receipt requested. If legal disputes arise in New York, these modifications could lead to uncertainty about proper notice. Courts generally prefer reliable methods to confirm receipt, particularly in scenarios where timely notification affects legal rights.
perturbation.contradicted_law: New York Civil Practice Law and Rules (CPLR) regarding service of process and notification.
